about.title: About the WA Knowledge Test
about.description: The Washington State driver's knowledge test consists of 40 multiple-choice questions covering traffic laws, road signs, and safe driving practices.
about.passRequirement: âœ… You must answer at least 32 questions correctly (80%) to pass.
about.materialsTitle: Our comprehensive study materials cover all five chapters:

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of Washington drivers who have passed their test with confidence!

study.title: Study Mode
study.subtitle: Master the material with interactive flashcards

practice.title: Practice Mode
practice.subtitle: Test your knowledge with instant feedback

test.title: Washington State Knowledge Test Simulation
test.subtitle: Experience the real test format before taking the actual exam

info.title: Test Information
info.formatDesc: Review at end, like real test

instructions.title: Test Instructions
instructions.item1: Answer all 40 questions by selecting the best answer for each
instructions.item2: You can change your answers before submitting
instructions.item3: Review all questions before final submission
instructions.item4: Results and explanations shown after submission
instructions.item5: You need 32 correct answers (80%) to pass

tips.title: ðŸ’¡ Test Tips
tips.tip1: â€¢ Read each question carefully before selecting your answer
tips.tip2: â€¢ Don't rush - take your time to think through each question
tips.tip3: â€¢ If unsure, eliminate obviously wrong answers first
tips.tip4: â€¢ Trust your first instinct unless you find a clear mistake
tips.tip5: â€¢ Review all questions before submitting if time permits

bookmarks.noQuestionsInCategory: No bookmarked questions in this category

chapters.title: Study by Chapter
chapters.subtitle: Learn the Washington State Driver Guide organized by chapter

chapter1.title: Licenses
chapter1.description: Licensing process, types, requirements, DUI laws, and violations

chapter2.title: Vehicles
chapter2.description: Registration, maintenance, safety features, and occupant protection

chapter3.title: Drivers
chapter3.description: Impairment, distraction, decision-making, and safe driving behaviors

chapter4.title: Roads
chapter4.description: Sharing roads, traffic rules, right-of-way, and emergency procedures

chapter5.title: Hazards
chapter5.description: Weather hazards, road conditions, wildlife, mechanical failures, and emergency procedures

about.title: ðŸ“– About the WA Driver Guide
about.description: The Washington State Driver Guide is your official resource for learning the rules of the road. All questions on the knowledge test are based on these four chapters. Study each chapter thoroughly to ensure you're prepared for your driver's license exam.

review.title: Review Mode
review.subtitle: Practice the questions you got wrong to improve your knowledge
review.description: After completing quizzes in Practice Mode, any questions you answer incorrectly are automatically tracked. You can then review these specific questions to focus your studying on areas that need improvement.

steps.title: To use Review Mode:
steps.step1: Complete some quizzes in Practice Mode
steps.step2: Any incorrect answers will be tracked automatically
steps.step3: Return here to review only your incorrect questions
steps.step4: Master the material and improve your accuracy!

tips.title: ðŸ’¡ Study Tips
tips.tip1: â€¢ Focus on understanding the "why" behind each answer
tips.tip2: â€¢ Review the explanations carefully for incorrect answers
tips.tip3: â€¢ Use bookmarks to save particularly challenging questions
tips.tip4: â€¢ Practice consistently to build long-term retention
tips.tip5: â€¢ Take breaks between study sessions to avoid fatigue

footer.disclaimer: Unofficial practice tool. Please refer to official WA DOL materials for your exam.
